title: Font in a Logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054113im_/http:/typophile.com/files/atomic_logo_5993.gif)

Hello, I'm trying to figure out what the font is for "PEST CONTROL, LLC".  
Thanks so much! Typophile rocks.

Font: 

 Eras ITC & Helvetica Neue Condensed Black / Bold 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054113/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [atomic\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054113/http:/typophile.com/files/atomic_logo.gif) | 10.95 KB |
author: fervus

comments.content: [Eras ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054113/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/eras) and [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054113/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica) (Condensed Black and Bold) should du the job.

Ryuk good call on Eras ITC, and I should have recognized Helvetica but it was squished and skewed so... thanks! It doesn't matter for my project, but just for kicks, the ", LLC" part is apparently a different font than the other two and I can't figure that one out either. But Helvetica Neue is what I needed, so thank you!!
For the /LLC, I'm pretty convinced it's a Frankestein with /L from Helvetica Neue and /C from Eras.
